entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 29. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MDT Thursday 23 March 2023
